channel.title: technology on Pao News
channel.description: Recent content in technology on Pao News

item.title: Beijing subway traffic: The combanition of Line 1 and Line Batong is a long journey
item.description: Cover: The passengers are waiting for the transfer at SiHui East Station. Most of them are playing with their mobile phones. They look really tired. All passengers had to get off the train in this transfer station. The waste of time made them physically and mentally exhausted. var playerElement = document.getElementById("player-wrapper"); var player = new Clappr.Player({ source: "/Story 4/Video/Story 4 Video.mp4", height: 360, width: 640, }); player.

item.title: Where is Panjiayuan Flea Market going under the impact of electronic economy?
item.description: var playerElement = document.getElementById("player-wrapper"); var player = new Clappr.Player({ source: "/Story 2/Video/Story 2 Video.mp4", height: 360, width: 640, }); player.attachTo(playerElement); In addition to the huge harm to people’s health, the 2019 novel coronavirus epidemic also has an enormous impact on the economy. Located on the Beijing Third Ring Road, Panjiayuan Flea Market has lost much foot traffic due to the epidemic, forcing many vendors to withdraw from the market and find other ways to earn a living.
